title: 582. Mike Mayock on Challenges of Evaluating With No Preseason
itunes:title: 582. Mike Mayock on Challenges of Evaluating With No Preseason
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys react to the news of the Bucs signing running back Leonard Fournette and the Bengals giving running back Joe Mixon a contract extension (2:52). After that, the pair talk to Raiders GM Mike Mayock as he discusses the message he gave his scouts during this pandemic, how much he believes in QB Derek Carr and much more (13:12).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
